name: Haunted (itch) (Triargon)
description:
Lost in a forgotten valley, surrounded by shadows of dark forces...  There is no way to escape. Except the Sacrifice... Find your path through the darkness of the woods and search for the artefacts. Strange things will happen at night, and the only thing you can trust is your handy flashlight. Will you be able to escape?

Story

Elder tales speak about a haunted abandoned valley, where dark forces curse all who dare to pass by. You, an adventurer and a well-grounded individual, decide to explore it and prove that there is no such curse.  Things take an unexpected turn as the valley shifted form and has trapped you in as soon as you had reached the bottom.

Sunset in the valley

With only a lantern left you now take your whole life in your hands, going out in the darkness. The  clues you have are the writings in blood of past unfortunate explorers. Long forgotten artefacts may appear during darkness,  but be aware as She always knows where you are.

Artefact Recommendations

The game relies heavily on sound for gameplay and feedback to the user purposes, so please do not mute it.

Controls
  • Move - W, A, S, D
  • Look Around - Mouse
  • Switch Lantern On/Off - Q
  • Interact - E
